questions.question: What is Zoom Lighting Online?
questions.answer: Zoom Lighting Online is a free web tool that turns your screen into a bright, soft light source â€” perfect for improving your appearance on video calls, live streams, or online meetings.

questions.question: How do I use it?
questions.answer: Simply open the page, choose your preferred brightness or color, and make your browser full screen. The screen will act as a virtual light for your face or background.

questions.question: Does it really make me look better on Zoom?
questions.answer: Yes! A bright, even light helps your camera capture clearer, more natural skin tones. It reduces shadows and makes your video look more professional.

questions.question: Can I adjust the brightness or color temperature?
questions.answer: Yes. Use your device's brightness controls, or switch between white, warm, and cool color options to find the lighting that suits you best.

questions.question: Is Zoom Lighting safe for my eyes?
questions.answer: Yes, it's completely safe. However, avoid staring directly at bright white light for long periods â€” use it at a comfortable brightness level.

questions.question: Does it work on phones or tablets?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Zoom Lighting works on any device with a web browser â€” desktop, laptop, tablet, or mobile.

questions.question: Do I need to download anything?
questions.answer: No downloads or sign-ups required. Just open the page and use it instantly.

questions.question: Can I use it for photography or streaming too?
questions.answer: Yes. Many people use Zoom Lighting as a quick and simple soft light for YouTube videos, Twitch streams, and portrait photos.

questions.question: Is it free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, Zoom Lighting Online is 100% free and doesn't include any ads or watermarks.

questions.question: Does it work offline?
questions.answer: You need an internet connection to load the page, but once it's loaded, it will continue to display the light even if your connection drops.

temperatureControl.title: Temperature Control
temperatureControl.description: Adjust the color temperature to create the perfect lighting for your video calls. Lower values create warmer light, higher values create cooler light.
